name: LitecoinPriceQuote
0:
”Alexa, open litecoin price”
”Alexa, start litecoin price”
”Alexa, launch litecoin price”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: litecoin price
des:
Gets the current price of Litecoin (LTC) cryptocurrency in US dollars, as well as the percentage of change over the last 24 hours and last 7 days.

You only have to open the skill to get the quote, so it's quicker and easier than other crypto quote skills.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
